name: Snowflake
tldr: Represents winter, cold, or can be slang for someone overly sensitive.

contextMeanings.meaning: Referring to snow, winter, or cold weather.
Calling someone overly sensitive or easily offended.
Self-deprecating about being cold or distant.

platformNotes.note: Often used as an insult in political debates (calling someone a 'snowflake').
Popular for winter content and holiday posts.
Used in winter aesthetic content and calling out sensitivity.

generationalNotes.note: Aware of both literal and 'sensitive person' meanings.
May use ironically about themselves or weather.
Often uses as an insult for younger generations they see as sensitive.

warnings.title: Can Be Insulting
warnings.description: Calling someone a 'snowflake' is often used as an insult implying they're too sensitive.

seoTitle: ❄️ Snowflake Emoji Meaning - What Does ❄️ Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the snowflake emoji ❄️ really means in texting. Represents winter or can be slang for someone sensitive. Complete context guide.
